factions.name: UNSC Assault Commander
uniqueAbilities: The UNSC Assault Commander has acess to specialist boarding troops for purchase in their fleet.

factions.name: Covenant Assault Commander
uniqueAbilities: The Covenant Assault Commander has acess to specialist boarding troops for purchase in their fleet.

factions.name: Lord Hood
uniqueAbilities: Lord Hood is unflappable under preasure and measured in all aspects of his command.

factions.name: Michael Stanforth
uniqueAbilities: Vice Admiral Stanforth galvanised the UNSC forces at Reach into a formidible force using a combination of raw charisma and intuitive command skills.

factions.name: Xytan 'Jar Wattinree
uniqueAbilities: A gifted military opportunist, Xytan 'Jar Wattniree is capable of taking advantage of the slightest flaw in an opponent's plan.

factions.name: Rho 'Barutamee
uniqueAbilities: Rho 'Barutamee is a skilled military leader and an excellent tactician.

keywords.name: Battle Groups
keywords.definition:
Standard Battle Groups must adhere to three rules:
1. They MUST contain at least 1 Capital Element.
2. They MUST contain at least 1 Non-Capital Element.
3. The combined Build Rating (BR) MUST NOT exceed BR 6 (see the Fleet Building chapter on page 22 of the Halo: Fleet Battles core rulebook).

keywords.name: Plasma Beam Overload
keywords.definition: This Formation may choose to overload its Plasma Beam. This formation immediately gains a Vulnerable Marker and increases the Attack Dice of the Plasma Beam by +3 until the end of the Game Turn.

keywords.name: Hunter Assault Cadres
keywords.definition: This Formation begins the game with all its Type-28 Boarding Craft packed with Hunter Assault Cadres for no additional cost.

keywords.name: Cathedral of the Faithful
keywords.definition: Each Section on a CAS can replace ONE of its listed Boarding Craft with a Zealot for No Points. This bonus is in addition to the standard number of Zealots available to the fleet.

keywords.name: Seraph Hosts
keywords.definition: All Seraph Interceptor Wings launched by a CAS increase their maximum size to 6 rather than the normal 5.

keywords.name: Command Centre
keywords.definition: A Fleet Containing a Golden Path Battle Group may re-roll a Single Order Dice at the beginning of either the Attacks or Boarding Segments (but not both).

keywords.name: Hunter Killers
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Torpedoes at Short Range.

keywords.name: Focused Wrath
keywords.definition: All Plasma Cannon Array Attacks made by this Element may re-roll a single Attack Dice for each friendly Zealot on board.

keywords.name: ADP Escorts
keywords.definition: All ADP Escort Formations in a Battle Group can add their Point Defense to that of any Capital Formation in the same Battle Group, but only when the Capital Formation is attacked by weapons with the Missiles Loadout.

keywords.name: Penitents
keywords.definition: This Element counts as having the Assault Specialist (1) Loadout while defending during the Boarding Resolution Phase.

keywords.name: Hidden Killer
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Torpedoes at Short Range.

keywords.name: Plasma Beam Overload
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Beam Weapons.

keywords.name: Hunter Assault Cadres
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a Skull when firing Plasma Torpedoes at Short Range.

keywords.name: Wall of Fire
keywords.definition: This Battle Group may roll 2 Halo dice rather than 1 when resolving the effects of MAC Loadout, prior to the Defense Dice Pool being rolled.

keywords.name: Pack Hunters
keywords.definition: All Elements in this Battle Group may re-roll any Initial Rolls of a [skull] when firing MACs - These re-rolled dice may NOT generate any further re-rolls.

keywords.name: Advanced Targeting Solution
keywords.definition: All Attacks made by this Battle Group may re-roll any attempt to cause a Critical Hit.

keywords.name: Carrier Refit
keywords.definition: The Supported Marathon loses its Missile Barrage Loadout but gains the Carrier (1) Loadout. Additionally, the Supported Marathon in the Cyclops SBG has a Hanger Rating of 5, instead of the 2 it would normally have.

keywords.name: Frigate Resupply
keywords.definition: During the Repairs Step of and End Phase, a Punic may allow a Single Paris Element within 10 to remove a Single Damage Marker from its base. Where applicable, this Can restore Titanium Armor.

keywords.name: Automated Repair Systems
keywords.definition: Each time a Vulnerable Marker is applied to a section of the Punic, roll a Halo Dice: on a [1] or [2], the Vulnerable Marker is immediately removed.

keywords.name: Limited Resources
keywords.definition:
All Punics and CAS exist as individual Battle Groups and are not required to follow the standard rules for Battle Group Creation.
Whilst they are not Specialist Battle Groups, they are restricted by the size of Fleet they are attached to. Therefore a single Punic or CAS can be included in a Fleet for every Full 1250 Points being played.

keywords.name: Advanced Targeting
keywords.definition: This Formation may choose to re-roll any INITIAL rolls of a [skull] when performaing an attack with its Heavy MAC Cannon. These dice must be rolled separately. The Attack then moves to the Re-roll Step as normal

keywords.name: ODST Strike Teams
keywords.definition: This Formation begins the game with all its Pelican Boarding Craft embarked with ODST Strike Teams for an additional +5 points each.

keywords.name: Fighter Cover
keywords.definition: Only Interceptors can be selected by MAC Platforms. Bombers are not available.

keywords.name: Vital Defensive Asset
keywords.definition: A Maximum of 2 MAC Platforms per FULL 1000 points are permitted.

keywords.name: *High Value Target
keywords.definition: This vessel is considered to have a Build Rating of One less than listed during the process of Fleet Building, reverting to its stated Build Rating for the purposes of calculating Victory Points only.

keywords.name: Prototype Wings
keywords.definition: Interceptor wings deployed by this group may be replaced with Sabre (Interceptors). Sabres launched by this battlegroup take up ONE flight slot, not two.

keywords.name: Operational Support
keywords.definition: During the Perform Carrier Actions step in the End Phase, you may place a single new Boarding Craft on the Phoenix's Formation Base. This Formation may never exceed its original Boarding Craft allocation at any given time.

keywords.name: Ammunition Re-supply
keywords.definition: This Formation ignores all Damage when determining its number of Successess when firing MACs and Missile Weapons.

standardOrders.name: "Increase Firepower!"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Attack Order die. An Element may increase the number of Attack Dice rolled in a Secondary Weaponry Attack by +2. This Order must be rolled prior to any Initial Dice Roll.

standardOrders.name: "Enhance Fire Control"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Attack Order die. Add +2 Halo Dice to any Firing Solution. This Order may be issued at any time, but before the Defense Dice Pool is rolled.

standardOrders.name: "Focused Attack"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Attack Order die. An Element may re-roll up to TWO Attack Dice. These dice may only be re-rolled once. This Order is issued after any Initial Dice are rolled either during the Attack Segment or the Boarding Resolution Phase.

standardOrders.name: "Brutal Attack"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Attack Order die. Any Attack may add TWO attack dice. This Order is issued after any Initial Dice are rolled during the Attack Segment.

standardOrders.name: "Repair Those Bulkheads!"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Defense Order die. The Element may remove a single Vulnerable Marker allocated to it. This Order must be executed during the Execute Order Step of the Order Dice Phase of a Turn.

standardOrders.name: "Brace! Brace! Brace!"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Defense Order die. When targeted by a Firing Solution, an Element may add +2 to the Defense Dice Roll, even if the Element lost its Titanium Armor. This Order may be issued after an Initial Attack Dice Pool roll.

standardOrders.name: "Do What It Takes"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Defense Order die.An Element may roll a Halo Dice during the Repair Phase. On a roll of a Hit or Critical Hit, the Formation may remove a single Damage Marker from its base. This order may be issued during the Repairs Step of the End Phase.

standardOrders.name: "Power To The Defenses!"
standardOrders.definition: An Element may re-roll a SINGLE Initial Defense Array die rolled by an Element. This dice may only be re-rolled once. This Order may be issued after any initial Defense Dice Pool Roll.

standardOrders.name: "Form Up!"
standardOrders.definition: Spend 1 Command Order die. The Fleet Commander may order the re-building of a Battle Group upt to a maximum BR of 6. See the Ad-hoc Battle Groups rules in the rulebook. This Order must be executed during the Execute Orders Step of the Order Dice Phase.

specialOrders.name: "Prepare for Boarders!"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 2 Defense and 1 Command Order die. Increase the Security Detail present on-board a single friendly Capital Element by +4 for this Turn. This Order must be issued during the Orders Step of the Boarding Resolution Phase.

specialOrders.name: "Take It To Them!"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 3 Attack Order die. Increase the Attack Dice of EACH friendly Security Detail on-board a target enemy Element by +2. This Order must be issued during the Orders Step of the Boarding Resolution Phase.

specialOrders.name: "Inspiration"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 2 Defense Order dice. Remove ALL Vulnerable Markers from ALL Elements in a selected Battle Group. This Order must be issued during the Orders Step of the selected Battle Group's Activation.

specialOrders.name: "Engage In Strength!"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 3 Attack and 1 Command Order die. ONCE per Turn, Lord Hood can call a general attack order, allowing up to TWO Standard Battle Groups to activate together, performing their respective Movement and Attack Segments as if they were a single Battle Group for the remainder of the Game Turn. This Order must be issued during the Execute Orders Step of the Orders Phase.

specialOrders.name: "The Cole Protocol"
specialOrders.definition: When calculating the amount of VPs awarded based on the BR of a friendly Element's destruction, reduce the VPs awarded by 1 (to a minimum of 1). Note that Elements with the High Value Target Loadout grant VPs as normal.

specialOrders.name: "Perfect Time To Strike"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 3 Defense Order dice. The Covenant Fleet automatically gains the Initiative this Turn. This order may be issued during the Executive Order Step of the Order Dice Phase.

specialOrders.name: "Superiority"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 3 Attack Order Dice. Increase the Security Detail of ALL Zealots in the Fleet by +2 for the remainder of the Turn. This order may be issued during the Execute Order Step of the Boarding Resolution Phase.

specialOrders.name: "Fix Those Defenses!"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 3 Defense Order dice. Remove ALL Vulnerable Markers from a Capital Element in the Fleet. This Order must be issued during the Orders Step of the selected Element's Activation.

specialOrders.name: "Enhanced Targeting"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 3 Attack Order dice. Increase the Firepower Rating of a Firing Solution by +2. This Order must be issued prior to rolling the Initial Attack Dice Pool, either when rolling the Firing Solution OR when rolling as part of the Defense Dice Pool Roll against enemy Boarders.

specialOrders.name: "Burn the Heretics!"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 1 Attack and 1 Command Order die. A single Battle Group receives FOUR additional automatic hits on each of its Firing Solutions for the rest of the activation. This Order must be issued during the Execute Order step of the Order Dice Phase.

specialOrders.name: "Jiralhanae Frenzy"
specialOrders.definition: Spend 1 Attack and 1 Command Order die. Increase the Security Detail rating of ALL Brutes in the fleet by +1 for the remainder of the turn. This order must be issued during the Execute Orders Step of the Boarding Resolution Phase.

uniqueAbilities.name: "Brilliant Strategy!"
uniqueAbilities.definition: When spending a Command Order die, roll one Halo die. On a Hit result, keep the Command Order die. On a Critical result, swap the Command Order die to any face and keep it.

uniqueAbilities.name: "Fire at Will!"
uniqueAbilities.definition: When executing the Increase Firepower Order, you may choose to increase the Primary, instead of the Secondary, Weaponry Attack by +2.

uniqueAbilities.name: "Keep it Frosty!"
uniqueAbilities.definition: Increase the movment to all of your wings by +1 inches. Additionally, increase your firing solutions that target wings by +1 die (including Point Defense).

uniqueAbilities.name: "Time to Dance!"
uniqueAbilities.definition: When you resolve the Boarding Victory table, roll 2 die instead of one. You may choose which result to take.

uniqueAbilities.name: The UNSC Assault Commander has acess to specialist boarding troops for purchase in their fleet.
uniqueAbilities.definition:
- Spartan-III Team: +40 points each
- ODST Strike Teams: +5 points each

uniqueAbilities.name: The Covenant Assault Commander has acess to specialist boarding troops for purchase in their fleet.
uniqueAbilities.definition:
- Hunter Assault Cadres: +20 points each
- Elite Zealots: +10 points each
- Brute Hunting Parties: +5 points each

uniqueAbilities.name: Vice Admiral Stanforth galvanised the UNSC forces at Reach into a formidible force using a combination of raw charisma and intuitive command skills.
uniqueAbilities.definition: Stanforth may re-roll TWO Fleet Orders Dice once per Turn. The second result MUST be accepted.

uniqueAbilities.name: Lord Hood is unflappable under preasure and measured in all aspects of his command.
uniqueAbilities.definition: He can choose to add +1 to the Initiative Dice roll each Turn.

uniqueAbilities.name: Slipspace Jump
uniqueAbilities.definition:
During the Deployment Step, place a Countdown Token on Admiral Cole's Command Card, then CHOOSE ONE of the following: 
1.Before deploying any Battle Groups, select ONE Battle Group to be held in Reserves, regardless of whether the scenario calls for it or not. During any of the Reserves Arrives Step, remove the Cooldown Token on Admiral Cole's Command Card to automatically bring in said Battle Group, deploying it ANYWHERE on the board. The Battle Group may then continue its activation, as normal, though no Boarding Craft may be launched.
2. Once per game, instead of activating a Battle Group normally, remove the Cooldown Token from Admiral Cole's Command Card to redeploy One unactivated Battle Group ANYWHERE on the battlefield by executign a Slipspace Jump. The selected Battle Group needs to be in coherency and can face any direction. The Battle Group may then continue its activation, as normal, though no Boarding Craft may be launched.

uniqueAbilities.name: A gifted military opportunist, Xytan 'Jar Wattniree is capable of taking advantage of the slightest flaw in an opponent's plan.
uniqueAbilities.definition: During the Execute Orders Step of the Orders Phase he can force the opponent to re-roll a single Order Dice each turn, but the second result MUST be accepted.

uniqueAbilities.name: Rho 'Barutamee is a skilled military leader and an excellent tactician.
uniqueAbilities.definition: He can therefore choose to re-roll the Initiative Dice each turn, but the second result MUST be accepted.

uniqueAbilities.name: Brutes
uniqueAbilities.definition: Replace ALL regular Boarding Tokens with Brute Hunting Parties Boarding Tokens. This is free, and their destruction does not award your opponent VPs.

uniqueAbilities.name: Blind Devotion
uniqueAbilities.definition: The Fleet being led by Maccabeus ignores ALL Damage Marker penalties when resolving Attack Dice Pools.

uniqueAbilities.name: Fleet Restrictions
uniqueAbilities.definition:
Vulnerable Markers are only repaired by a result of a Critical Hit on the Halo die. And that result only removes a SINGLE token. Additionally, a result of a Skull instead adds one additional Vulnerable Marker.
No Large or Massive Elements may be included in a fleet led by Maccabeus.
